name: politico
text: Welcome to RNC night 2. Speaking tonight: Melania Trump, Mike Pompeo, Rand Paul, Larry Kudlow, Eric and Tiffany Trump and more https://t.co/AbrWDNue88 https://t.co/Qf9D28MO5M

name: politico
text:
The Kremlin denied that Vladimir Putin was involved in the poisoning of Russian opposition leader and Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny, who has been in a coma since falling ill on board a flight to Moscow last week

name: politico
text:
We're back for Night Two of the RNC. 

Follow our reporters for live analysis of the speeches and programming:
https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
Tonight's RNC program begins where last night left off: With the GOP promoting diversity, says @politicoalex.

More live analysis from the Republican National Convention:
https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
Lizer‚Äôs appearance puts him at odds with Navajo Nation President Jonathan Nez, who spoke at the DNC last week. 

The Navajo Nation has been hard hit by the pandemic and Nez has criticized Trump for heralding federal aid to the tribe, says @PoliticoCharlie
https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
Rand Paul accused Joe Biden of calling for ‚Äúmore war.‚Äù But @nahaltoosi says that‚Äôs not really true: 

Yes, Biden supported some military actions, but in recent years he argued against getting involved in places like Libya and has wanted out of Afghanistan
https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
This weekend‚Äôs annual kickoff between Arkansas' top high school football teams will have thousands of fans in the stands.

The match is a survival test for fall sports, as Trump and other Republicans cheer for football to play on
https://t.co/gRuED7oHG4

name: politico
text:
In past years, administration officials haven‚Äôt usually spoken at political conventions just to keep politics separate. Trump has changed that with speakers and venues, says @anitakumar01.

More RNC live analysis:
https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
Sen. Lindsey Graham raised questions today about Jacob Blake's behavior in the lead up to his shooting by a police officer in Kenosha, Wis. on Sunday. 

A video of the incident shows that Blake, who is Black, was shot seven times in the back
https://t.co/exWPW8QrWM

name: politico
text:
Nicholas Sandmann‚Äôs RNC appearance tonight underscores just how much Trumpism is about being against not only liberal ideology but the media, too, says @meridithmcgraw

https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
Former Florida AG Pam Bondi earned her spot on the RNC stage tonight, says @MarcACaputo. 

She was the first and only statewide elected Republican in the 2016 Florida primary to endorse Donald Trump for president, dissing Sen. Marco Rubio in the process
https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
Trump opened the 2nd night of the #RNCConvention by pardoning Jon Ponder, a bank robber who founded a nonprofit upon his release from prison focused on preparing former inmates to reenter the workforce.

Key moments: https://t.co/7MSMYeiSk7
Live analysis: https://t.co/RB7bWa4D9J https://t.co/ijoKziyfkG

name: politico
text:
There‚Äôs no real attempt to humanize the president, as there has been with past candidates and presidents. But the thing about Trump is that there‚Äôs no need to, says @PoliticoCharlie.

Many of his supporters like the rhetoric and strength he seeks to convey
https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
The WH chief economic adviser promised Trump would be able to turn around the severe economic downturn driven by the #Covid pandemic.

And he slammed Biden‚Äôs plans to raise taxes on highest-earning households by about $4 trillion over 10 yrs https://t.co/FWy1EN0pPr #RNCConvention https://t.co/vxF8HeU8Ns

name: politico
text: Abby Johnson, founder of an anti-abortion group, made explosive claims about her time working at Planned Parenthood and cast the election as ‚Äúa choice between two radical anti-life activists and the most pro-life president we have ever had.‚Äù https://t.co/xUWqO4GZ3D #RNCConvention https://t.co/0DE8OSFnRt

name: politico
text:
So far, we‚Äôve had two Florida cameos on each of the first two nights of the RNC. It‚Äôs a sign of how critically important the state is to Trump‚Äôs reelection, says @MarcACaputo 

https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
Nicholas Sandmann, the Covington Catholic High School student who had a confrontation with protesters near the Lincoln Memorial, had an appearance at tonight's #RNCConvention.

He claimed that no one has been treated more unfairly by the media than Trump https://t.co/dhCcycea8c https://t.co/ZI1OmfvrCq

name: politico
text:
Sandmann was at the #March for Life rally in 2019 when he came face-to-face with a Native American elder, Nathan Phillips.

Pictures of the encounter made it seem as if he was antagonizing Phillips, but video later revealed Phillips approached him https://t.co/hSXoKZkbLx

name: politico
text:
Sandmann later filed a lawsuit against major media outlets, who he said never asked for his side of the story, and won.

Here are more key moments from tonight's #RNCConvention https://t.co/hSXoKZkbLx

name: politico
politico
text:
It‚Äôs no accident that this group includes an Indian American, says @anitakumar01. 

The Trump campaign has been aggressively trying to appeal to Indian Americans ‚Äì the group represents a growing voting bloc that registers and votes at high rates
https://t.co/KUW6PDJgV3

name: politico
text:
Former Florida AG Pam Bondi touted accusations against the Biden children of abusing their father‚Äôs vice presidency to land business deals.

And went after Hunter Biden in particular, who has become a common GOP punching bag.

More #RNCConvention moments https://t.co/pQVQhEJ63G https://t.co/1kkFfGZ053

name: politico
text:
‚ÄúThe Biden/Harris vision for America leaves no room for people of faith," Billy Graham's granddaughter claimed at the #RNCConvention.

She countered the Dems' White House ticket with Trump, whom she called the fierce advocate that people of faith needed https://t.co/8iJAtjPLKD https://t.co/cp4C9Lptrw

name: politico
text:
A collection of Trump‚Äôs top female aides cast him as a ‚Äúchampion for women‚Äù in a video.

Then Trump‚Äôs younger daughter, Tiffany, addressed the #RNCConvention, remarking that her father has ‚Äúdemonstrated his faith in his uncompromising heart and actions.‚Äù

https://t.co/UgMg2Ehwg7 https://t.co/lHQ5lMBoSb
